info.senderName: NWS Aberdeen (Northern and Northeastern South Dakota)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 24 at 8:24PM MDT by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Campbell County through 1015 PM CDT... At 924 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Mound City, or 12 miles north of Selby, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Artas. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for north central South Dakota.
